bpp/descriptor.name: Ortusolis
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: eMERG - A Women Entreprenuers Networking Group
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: eMERG - A Women Entreprenuers Networking Group

descriptor.name: Ortusolis
descriptor.short_desc: Networking with all the scientists of the world to bring in their latest innovations and knowledge to provide solutions to the health issues
descriptor.long_desc: Organization that empowers women entrepreneurs and professionals through training and sharing industry knowledge

descriptor.name: Plain Atta 1kg
descriptor.short_desc: Whole meal flour, or pulverized whole wheat, that is used in Indian chapati, puri, phulka, tandoori roti, and north Indian parotta
descriptor.long_desc: Brown in color, it is derived from the complete wheat kernel with bran

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: 105, 1st and 2nd floor, Dickenson Rd, above Chetty's coffee

descriptor.name: Plain Atta 2kg
descriptor.short_desc: Atta has gluten, that provides possessing and extensibility properties
descriptor.long_desc: Milled flour made from whole wheat grains. It's a combination of the germ, endosperm and bran of wheat grains

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: 105, 1st and 2nd floor, Dickenson Rd, above Chetty's coffee

descriptor.name: Plain Atta 2.5kg
descriptor.short_desc: Maida or refined flour is made from just the endosperm of whole wheat grains
descriptor.long_desc: High fiber atta is also high in iron and vitamin B1, both of which are vital dietary nutrients with several health benefits
